title: What Does ONB Mean on Social Media?

steps.title: ONB usually means “on bro.”
steps.content: ONB usually means “on bro.” This acronym is mostly used on social media and via text to convey trust or sincerity. If someone sends you a DM or text with “onb” in it, they’re crossing their heart or making a pinky promise. In other words, what they’re saying is the absolute truth, and they mean serious business. [1] X Research source This is the most common meaning on platforms like Snapchat.

steps.title: ONB can also mean “outward nose breath.”
steps.content: ONB can also mean “outward nose breath.” This meaning is typically used to replace LOL (laughing out loud). People may use this acronym to show amusement toward something or to say, “I’m laughing so hard right now!” Think of it like when you’re trying to stifle a laugh and all the air comes out of your nose—that’s what ONB can mean. [2] X Research source You might see this acronym most often on TikTok.

steps.title: In some instances, ONB stands for “old news bro.”
steps.content: In some instances, ONB stands for “old news bro.” How the abbreviation ONB is used can play a big part in what it means. In some text or social media conversations, ONB is used to say, “That’s old news, bro.” This usage is often paired with a 😂 or 🙄 emoji to show that they’re in the know and you’re not. [3] X Research source

steps.title: “On Bro” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “On Bro” Meaning Examples I’ll be at the party tonight, ONB! ONB Taylor Swift waved at me! I’M NOT JOKING 🤩 ONB! I’m telling you! He didn’t break up with her! I saw Harry Styles. I’ll send you a pic. It was definitely him onb

steps.title: “Outward Nose Breath” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “Outward Nose Breath” Meaning Examples Did you hear my dad’s joke? ONB 😂 ONB! Everyone is dancing! Is this a flash mob?? ONB I really can’t cook 😅 Penguins wearing sandals onb 🤭

steps.title: “Old News Bro” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “Old News Bro” Meaning Examples ONB Steve and Darren broke up like 3 weeks ago 💀 They announced the sequel last year onb Did you not watch the season finale? Onb 😂 ONB I really don’t care about the drama 🙄
